>    From: "deppenparade <SP-yahoo.com@...>"
> <SP-yahoo.com@...>
> Subject: Notification
> 
> Is there any built in possibility in junit (or in
> the swing 
> testrunner) to notify the user as soon as 
> 
> a) there's an error or failure
> or
> b) all tests have finished
> 
> or at least an event for which I could define the
> action to take in 
> these cases?

If you use ant to run junit, it will wait until the
tests are done before proceeding on to the next part
of the script, and I think that the later versions of
Ant (1.4, 1.5?) even have a mechanism to play a sound.
 http://jakarta.apache.org/ant
